content:
ctive
Create a professional web presence that effectively communicates the validated vision, showcases technical credibility, and converts visitor interest into actionable leads and commitments.
Key Activities
Design & User Experience
Wireframe Development: Strategic information architecture
Visual Design: Professional mockups reflecting institutional standards
Content Integration: Project presentation including:
Validated unit mix scenarios with pros/cons analysis
Financial transparency (budget ranges, IRR estimates)
Team credentials and technical validation details
SIP technology advantages and cost modeling capabilities
Professional renderings and site concept imagery
Technical Development
Front-End Development: Responsive, mobile-optimized interface
CMS Integration: Content management system for ongoing updates
Lead Capture: Sophisticated form integration for interest registration
Data Security: Secure data room setup for sensitive project information
Analytics: Performance tracking and reporting configuration
Quality Assurance
Testing Protocol: Multi-device and browser compatibility testing
Performance Optimization: Site speed and mobile experience optimization
Security Validation: Data protection and privacy compliance
Deliverables
Complete website wireframes and mockups
Fully developed and tested website
CMS integration and training
Lead capture system implementation
Secure data room configuration
Analytics dashboard setup
Mobile optimization completion
Competitive Positioning
Benchmarked against leading institutional housing websites to balance impactful visual presentation with technical depth, ensuring professional credibility while maintaining user engagement.
Budget Allocation: $28,000

Phase 5: Market Activation & Funding Acquisition
Supporting Documentation & Relationship Development
Objective
Provide comprehensive support for stakeholder outreach and funding acquisition, with scope dependent on whether North Star l
